languages.text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, it gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) effect. If the bleeding effect is removed, it is inflicted again at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} этого существа становится меньше 50%, оно получает +15% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}, а также эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (8). При снятии кровотечения оно накладывается снова в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существа.

traits.locale_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, it gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g}, and suffers the bleeding (8) {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect} effect{/g}. If the bleeding effect is removed, it is inflicted again at the start of this creature's turn.

If the bleeding effect is removed, it is inflicted again at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} этого существа становится меньше 50%, оно получает +15% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}, а также эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (8). При снятии кровотечения оно накладывается снова в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существа.
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, it gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) effect. If the bleeding effect is removed, it is inflicted again at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 当此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至50%以下时，暴击率提高15%，同时获得{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（8）效果。即便流血效果被移除，此生物的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时也会自动再次陷入流血状态。
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, it gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) effect. If the bleeding effect is removed, it is inflicted again at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至50%以下时，暴击率提高15%，同时获得流血（8）{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}效果{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}{/g}即便流血效果被移除，此生物的下个回合开始时也会自动再次陷入流血状态。

当此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至50%以下时，暴击率提高15%，同时获得{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（8）{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。即便流血效果被移除，此生物的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时也会自动再次陷入流血状态。

languages.text: この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50%以下になったとき、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}に+15%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(8)の効果を負う。出血効果が除去されると、この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に再び出血する。
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, it gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) effect. If the bleeding effect is removed, it is inflicted again at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50％以下になった時、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}に+15％の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得て、出血(8)の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}効果{/g}を負う。出血効果が取り除かれると、この生物のターン開始時に再び出血する。

この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50%以下になったとき、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}に+15%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(8)の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を負う。出血効果が除去されると、この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に再び出血する。

languages.text: Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de esta criatura bajan del 50%, gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} del +15 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico y sufre un efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (8). Si el efecto de hemorragia se elimina, vuelve a aplicarse al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de esta criatura.
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, it gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) effect. If the bleeding effect is removed, it is inflicted again at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de esta criatura bajan del 50%, gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} del +15 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico y sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto{/g} de hemorragia (8). Si el efecto de hemorragia se elimina, vuelve a aplicarse al principio del turno de esta criatura.

languages.text: Sinken die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} dieser Kreatur unter 50 %, erhält sie einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +15 % auf die kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} und wird mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (8) belegt. Wird der Blutung-Effekt entfernt, wird er zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} dieser Kreatur erneut verursacht.
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, it gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) effect. If the bleeding effect is removed, it is inflicted again at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Fallen die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} dieser Kreatur unter 50 %, erhält sie einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +15 %auf kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} und erleidet den {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}Effekt{/g} Blutung (8). Wird der Blutungs-Effekt entfernt, wird er zu Beginn des Zuges dieser Kreatur erneut verursacht.

languages.text: Lorsque les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de la réserve de cette créature passent sous la barre des 50 %, elle obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique et subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (8). Si cet effet est supprimé, il est de nouveau infligé au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de cette créature.
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, it gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) effect. If the bleeding effect is removed, it is inflicted again at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de la réserve de cette créature passent sous la barre des 50 %, elle obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique et subit l'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet{/g} Saignement (8). Si cet effet est retiré, il est de nouveau infligé au début du tour de cette créature.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %50'nin altına indiğinde kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığına{/g} +%15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} (8) etkisine maruz kalır. Kanama etkisi, ortadan kalkarsa yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında yeniden oluşur.
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50%, it gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (8) effect. If the bleeding effect is removed, it is inflicted again at the start of this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
